teo.isgci.problem

Class ProblemOnNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • teo.isgci.problem.ProblemOnNode

  • public class ProblemOnNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the algorithms and deduced complexities on a node. Complexities are deduced in multiple steps, see the class Problem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.HashSet<Algorithm> algos
      The algorithms
      protected Complexity[] complexity
      The complexities, as deduced in the different steps.
      protected GraphClass node
      The node
      protected Problem problem
      The problem
      protected static int STEPS
